733292f-a.title: Street scenes - Chinatown.
733292f-a.text:
Street Scenes: Chinese delicacies and curios for sale
to tourists in New Yorkts Chinatown. The writer believes
this setting to be on Bayard Street, slightly west of
Elisabeth Street.
1940
Alexander Alland, photo
733292f-a.folder: Bayard Street and Elizabeth Street, Manhattan, N.Y.

719638f-a.title: Manhattan: Elizabeth Street - Bayard Street
719638f-a.text:
Elizabeth Street, east side, between Bayard and Canal Streets.
Through clearance on the site of the former Thalia Theatre, appears the
(Third Ave., Elevated), The three buildings shown are Nos. 38-44 Bowery.
August 15, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.
719638f-a.folder: Elizabeth Street & Bayard Street, Manhattan, NY
